description.narrative: Fortalecer la capacidad tecnica del pais para promover exportaciones y atraer inversiones de forma coordinada, sistemica y sostenible (con un enfoque en un modelo de gestion por resultados y generacion de ingresos).
Support the country's technical capacity to promote exports and attract investment in a coordinated, systematic and sustainable way (with a focus on result-based management and income generation).
